Updated the `SightingPopup` component so the image floats to the right side of the text. Changes:

1. **Floating image**: The image now uses `float-right` to sit on the right side
2. **Text wrapping**: The text content wraps around the image
3. **Sizing**: Reduced the image size (`w-48 h-36`) so it fits nicely on the side
4. **Spacing**: Added margins (`ml-4 mb-2`) to create space between the image and text

The image will now appear on the right side of the popup with the text flowing around it. If you want it on the left instead, or different sizing, say the word and I can adjust.
